original_text: The Lord God will finish his work quickly. He has warned his people what he will do. And he will punish them completely.’ 9: See Isaiah 10:22-23. The Lord God will finish his work quickly. He has warned his people what he will do. And he will punish them completely.’ 9: See Isaiah 10:22-23. The Lord God will finish his work quickly.
korean_text: 주께서 땅 위에서 그 말씀을 이루고 속히 시행하시리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord God will finish his work quickly.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님은 그의 일을 빠르게 끝내실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: And he will punish them completely.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들을 완전히 벌하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord God will finish his work quickly.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님은 그의 일을 빠르게 끝내실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: And he will punish them completely.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들을 완전히 벌하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord God will finish his work quickly.
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님은 그의 일을 빠르게 끝내실 것입니다.
